table.mysql: CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.forms_fillouts}` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `form_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `session_id` varchar(40) default NULL, `start_date` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `submission_date` int(11) unsigned default '0', `referer` varchar(255) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.forms_data}` ( `fillout_id` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `element_id` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `element_value` text, `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.forms_actions}` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `form_id` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `type` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `value` varchar(255) default NULL, `pos` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `lang` char(3) NOT NULL default '', `metadata` varchar(255) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ); ALTER TABLE `{TABLE.forms_actions}` ADD `metadata` VARCHAR(255) after `lang`;

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.forms_preactions}` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `form_id` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `type` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `value` varchar(255) default NULL, `pos` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `lang` char(3) NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.forms_elements}` ( `element_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `element_type` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `form_id` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `pos` int(11) unsigned default '0', `required` tinyint(1) unsigned default '0', `required_msg` varchar(255) default NULL, `active` tinyint(1) unsigned default '0', `description` varchar(255) default NULL, `datasource` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `datasource_type` int(11) unsigned default '0', `datasource_label_field` varchar(255) default NULL, `datasource_value_field` varchar(255) default NULL, `lang` char(3) default NULL, `label` varchar(255) default NULL, `default_value` varchar(255) default NULL, `datasource_query` text, `readonly` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `size` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `maxlength` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `params` varchar(255) default NULL, `scripting_identifier` varchar(255) default NULL, `hide_label` int(1) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`element_id`) );
ALTER TABLE `{TABLE.forms_elements}` ADD `scripting_identifier` VARCHAR(255); ALTER TABLE `{TABLE.forms_elements}` ADD `hide_label` int(1) default NULL;

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.forms_elements_rules}` ( `form_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `element_id` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `compare_query` varchar(255) default NULL, `compare_type` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `value_field` varchar(255) default NULL, `value_query` text, `value_type` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `value` varchar(255) default NULL, `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `lang` char(3) NOT NULL default '', `error_msg` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.forms_elements_values}` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `element_id` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `label` varchar(255) default NULL, `value` varchar(255) default NULL, `pos` int(11) unsigned default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );
